Devon Fantasy
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Total points combined with Section A - Yorkshire 1947, Lancashire 1929. Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5 and cup. 4th annual contest. 12 bands competed.
